name: Love Is Not Bulletproof
description:
A bullet hell.

A dating simulator.
Immerse yourself in this game combining 2  great video game genres. 

Though you have limited health, not all is lost. due to your skills at talking to projectiles you are given a chance to persuade the oncoming projectile not to hit you. 
You have to use all your skills to think of the best response possible before the projectile hits.  

Do you have the ability to dodge and weave oncoming projectiles, or do you have the skills necessary to seduce them? Find out now with "Love is not bulletproof".
